name: Nature Escapes 2 (itch)
description:
Nature Escapes presents a new, stunning collection of hidden object scenes for your relaxation and entertainment. Immerse yourself in the search for hidden objects and enjoy exciting mini-games.

Discover the beauty of nature in meticulously crafted garden scenes. Seek hidden objects, challenge yourself with fun mini-games, and unwind with tranquil music. Assemble your own picturesque garden and expand your knowledge of plants from various regions of the world.

FEATURES

  • 24 chapters of nature fun!
  • Over 70 total HO Scenes and Minigames!
  • Fun facts about fun plants!
  • Explore gorgeous, handcrafted nature scenes!
  • Decorate your very own garden!

COLLECTOR'S EDITION

  • 6 extra locations
  • 12 minigames
  • Downloadable wallpapers
  • Music player
  • Additional plants and flowers
  • Explore the developer's own plant children.

Embark on a relaxing journey with Nature Escapes!
